```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(MASS)
library(jeksterslabRboot)
context("Test Nonparametric Bootstrap - Bivariate.")
```


## Parameters


```{r parameters}
n <- 1000
B <- 1000
rho <- runif(
  n = 1,
  min = -1,
  max = 1
)
theta <- rho
Sigma <- matrix(
  data = c(
    1,
    rho,
    rho,
    1
  ),
  nrow = 2
)
mu <- c(0, 0)
var_thetahat <- ((1 - rho^2)^2) / n
se_thetahat <- sqrt(var_thetahat)
Variable <- c(
  "`n`",
  "`theta`",
  "`var_thetahat`",
  "`se_thetahat`"
)
Description <- c(
  "Sample size.",
  "Population correlation.",
  "Variance of the sampling distribution of the sample correlation.",
  "Standard error of the sampling distribution of the sample correlation."
)
Notation <- c(
  "$n$",
  "$\\theta = \\rho$",
  "$\\mathrm{Var} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\frac{ \\left( 1 - \\rho^2 \\right)^2}{n}$",
  "$\\mathrm{se} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\frac{ 1 - \\rho^2 }{\\sqrt{n}}$"
)
Value <- c(
  n,
  theta,
  var_thetahat,
  se_thetahat
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable,
    Description,
    Notation,
    Value
  ),
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "Population Parameters"
)
```


## Generate Data


```{r generate_data}
X <- mvrnorm(
  n = n,
  Sigma = Sigma,
  mu = mu
)
```


## Estimate Correlation


```{r estimate}
rhohat <- cor(X)[2, 1]
thetahat <- rhohat
varhat_thetahat <- ((1 - rhohat^2)^2) / (n - 2)
sehat_thetahat <- sqrt(varhat_thetahat)
ci <- cor.test(X[, 1], X[, 2])
ci_ll <- ci$conf.int[1]
ci_ul <- ci$conf.int[2]
Variable <- c(
  "`n`",
  "`thetahat`",
  "`varhat_thetahat`",
  "`sehat_thetahat`"
)
Description <- c(
  "Sample size.",
  "Sample correlation.",
  "Estimate of the variance of the sampling distribution of the sample correlation.",
  "Estimate of the standard error of the sampling distribution of the sample correlation."
)
Notation <- c(
  "$n$",
  "$\\hat{\\theta} = \\hat{\\rho}_{x, y} = \\frac{\\sum_{i = 1}^{n} \\left(x_i - \\hat{\\mu}_{x} \\right) \\left(y_i - \\hat{\\mu}_{y} \\right)}{\\sqrt{\\sum_{i = 1}^{n} \\left( x_i -  \\hat{\\mu}_{x} \\right)^2} \\sqrt{\\sum_{i = 1}^{n} \\left( y_i -  \\hat{\\mu}_{y} \\right)^2}}$",
  "$\\hat{\\mathrm{Var}} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\frac{ \\left( 1 - \\hat{\\rho}^2 \\right)^2}{n - 2}$",
  "$\\hat{\\mathrm{se}} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\frac{ 1 - \\hat{\\rho}^2 }{\\sqrt{n - 2}}$"
)
Value <- c(
  n,
  thetahat,
  varhat_thetahat,
  sehat_thetahat
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable,
    Description,
    Notation,
    Value
  ),
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "Sample Statistics"
)
```


## Bootstrap


```{r bootstrap}
X_star <- nb(
  data = X,
  B = B
)
thetahat_star <- lapply(
  X = X_star,
  FUN = function(X) cor(X)[2, 1]
)
thetahat_star <- as.vector(
  do.call(
    what = "rbind",
    args = thetahat_star
  )
)
mean_thetahat_star <- mean(thetahat_star)
var_thetahat_star <- var(thetahat_star)
sd_thetahat_star <- sqrt(var_thetahat_star)
Variable <- c(
  "`B`",
  "`mean_thetahat_star`",
  "`var_thetahat_star`",
  "`sd_thetahat_star`"
)
Description <- c(
  "Bootstrap samples.",
  "Mean of $B$ sample correlations.",
  "Variance of $B$ sample correlations.",
  "Standard deviation of $B$ sample correlations."
)
Notation <- c(
  "$B$",
  "$\\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( \\cdot \\right) = \\frac{1}{B} \\sum_{b = 1}^{B} \\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( b \\right)$",
  "$\\hat{\\mathrm{Var}}_{\\mathrm{B}} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\frac{1}{B - 1} \\sum_{b = 1}^{B} \\left[ \\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( b \\right) - \\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( \\cdot \\right) \\right]^2$",
  "$\\hat{\\mathrm{se}}_{\\mathrm{B}} \\left( \\hat{\\theta} \\right) = \\sqrt{ \\frac{1}{B - 1} \\sum_{b = 1}^{B} \\left[ \\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( b \\right) - \\hat{\\theta}^{*} \\left( \\cdot \\right) \\right]^2 }$"
)
Value <- c(
  B,
  mean_thetahat_star,
  var_thetahat_star
)
Value <- c(
  B,
  mean_thetahat_star,
  var_thetahat_star,
  sd_thetahat_star
)
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable,
    Description,
    Notation,
    Value
  ),
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "Nonparametric Bootstrapping Results"
)
```


### Bootstrap Sampling Distribution


```{r plot}
hist(
  thetahat_star,
  breaks = 100,
  main = expression(
    paste(
      "Histogram of ",
      hat(theta),
      "*"
    )
  ),
  xlab = expression(
    paste(
      hat(theta),
      "*"
    )
  )
)
```



### Confidence Intervals


```{r wald}
wald <- wald(
  thetahat = thetahat,
  sehat_thetahat = sehat_thetahat,
  eval = TRUE
)
```



```{r pc}
pc <- pc(
  thetahat_star = thetahat_star,
  thetahat = thetahat,
  wald = TRUE,
  eval = TRUE
)
```



```{r bc}
bc <- bc(
  thetahat_star = thetahat_star,
  thetahat = thetahat,
  wald = TRUE,
  eval = TRUE
)
```



```{r bca}
bca <- bca(
  thetahat_star = thetahat_star,
  thetahat = thetahat,
  data = X,
  fitFUN = function(X) cor(X)[2, 1],
  wald = TRUE,
  eval = TRUE
)
```



```{r ci}
knitr::kable(
  x = as.data.frame(
    rbind(
      wald,
      pc,
      bc,
      bca
    )
  ),
  caption = "Confidence Intervals"
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01}
test_that("mean", {
  expect_equivalent(
    thetahat,
    mean_thetahat_star,
    tolerance = 0.01
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_02}
test_that("se", {
  expect_equivalent(
    se_thetahat,
    sd_thetahat_star,
    tolerance = 0.01
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_03}
test_that("2.5 is equal to cor.test", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = ci_ll,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = wald["ci_2.5"],
      digits = 2
    ),
    tolerance = 0.02
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_04}
test_that("97.5 is equal to cor.test", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = ci_ul,
      digits = 2
    ),
    round(
      x = wald["ci_97.5"],
      digits = 2
    ),
    tolerance = 0.02
  )
})
```



```{r testthat_05}
test_that("2.5", {
  expect_equivalent(

    ),

      digits = 2
    ),

    ),

      x = bca["ci_2.5"],

    ),

  )
})
```



```{r testthat_06}
test_that("97.5", {
  expect_equivalent(
    round(
      x = wald["ci_97.5"],

    ),

    ),

    ),

  )
})
```
